parameters: Raven: Oi, Zeke! Where you going? I
thought you were buying the next
What can I do for ya?\NPCa
Hope you and your party enjoy themselves!\NPCa
Be with you in just a minute,
So, there I was facing down the ferocious ogre.\eri
My fireball failed me and the ogre managed to get in
A lucky punch? More like he got catapulted to
the other side of the mine.\rav
He sure likes telling stories of our adventures, doesn't he?
Fine with me, as long as he doesn't bring up
You hear the rumor about the knights of Thorndale
decimating a brigade of 50 Rosen soldiers?\NPCa
I hear it only took six of 'em.\NPCa
Six people against a brigade of 50 soldiers? \NPCa
You don't believe that actually happened, do you?\NPCa
Not at first, but I hear 'Iron Wall' Leon led them.\NPCa
Hard to believe that old man hasn't retired yet!
He should leave the fighting to the new generation already.
Though, when it comes to THAT man, common sense
The thing about actually meeting a 'legend' in real life...
Most of the time they turn out to be nothing like
the rumors. In the end it's almost always just talk. \rav
Hmph! 'Iron Wall' Leon had already made a name for
himself before you were walking, little girl.\NPCa
If he and these six guys are as strong as you say,
I'd love to cross blades with them someday.\rav
Hmph. I sincerely doubt that you would, lass. \NPCa
Speaking of all talk, you wear an eyepatch. I bet it's
just to make yourself 'look' dangerous. You go toe to
toe with a real sword fighter...\NPCa
I'd bet you'd curl up and cry, hmph!\NPCa
You thought what? It was fake, for 'show'?!\rav
I didn't lose it curling up or crying, I'll tell you that!
Some guy overheard you talking about taking out an ogre
and offered you lots of gold to get this package
Yes, it'll be an easy job too!\eri
We take a three day hike through the woods and we'll
Right. Zeke, what do you think?\rav
We will gather supplies for our journey to Westshire
and head out early tomorrow morning. \zek
Erik has the package. It would seem that we already have. \zek
Let's enjoy ourselves tonight then head back back to the inn.
Fantastic! I'm itching for another adventure. A cheers! \eri
To our upcoming adventure and the new stories
To making it through one more time.\zek
Goddess save us, Zeke... A somber cheer like that
will make the ale taste bad. \rav

Hope you and your party enjoy themselves!\NPCa
